    • MessageLine

      public MessageLine(Composite parent, int style)

  • Method Details

    • setErrorStatus

      public void setErrorStatus(IStatus status)
      Sets the message and image to the given status.
      Parameters:
      status - IStatus or null. null will set the empty text and no image.
